price: (Nuhu) aravuga ati “Ntabwo nshinzwe kumenya ibyo bakora (icyo nshinzwe ni ukubagezaho ubutumwa gusa)”
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
